column.name: ArticleId
column.Comment: 每篇游记都有属于自己的ID

column.name: Content
column.Comment: 游记内容，值为文本路径

column.name: BillId
column.Comment: 若有绑定账单，其账单的ID

column.name: Is_Choicely
column.Comment: 是否为精选游记，是为T，否为F

column.name: Is_GoodKid
column.Comment: 是否为小当家游记，是为T，否为F

column.name: UserId
column.Comment: 表明该账本属于哪位用户

column.name: Id
column.Comment: 账单项Id，唯一注明该支出记录

column.name: BillId
column.Comment: 指明该支出项属于哪一账单

column.name: Info
column.Comment: 用户对该项支出进行的备注

column.name: TargetId
column.Comment: TargetId指向的即为本用户的好友之一

column.name: Note
column.Comment: 默认为用户名，可改备注

column.name: ReviewId
column.Comment: 每条楼中楼评论的唯一标识

column.name: RelationShip
column.Comment: 用户关系，说明UserId对应TargetId的身份

column.name: UserType
column.Comment: 描述身份（学生/家长），C为学生，P为家长
